twcore.core.events
Class BallPosition

java.lang.Object
  twcore.core.events.SubspaceEvent
      twcore.core.events.BallPosition

public class BallPosition
extends SubspaceEvent

(S2C 0x2E) Event fired when a player picks up a ball.


 +-------------------------+
 |Offset Length Description|
 +-------------------------+
 |0        1    Type Byte  |
 |1        1    Ball ID    |
 |2        2    X location |
 |4        2    Y location |
 |6        2    X Velocity |
 |8        2    Y Velocity |
 |10       2    Player ID  |
 |12       4    Timestamp  |
 +-------------------------+

Constructor Summary
BallPosition(ByteArray array)
          Creates a new instance of BallPosition; this is called by GamePacketInterpreter when it receives the packet.
 
Method Summary
 byte getBallID()
          Gets the ID of the ball that was picked up.
 short getPlayerID()
          Gets the ID of the player who picked up the ball.
 int getTimeStamp()
          Gets the Time Stamp of the ball that was picked up.

          Gets the X location of the ball that was picked up.

          Gets the X velocity of the ball that was picked up.
 short getYLocation()
          Gets the Y location of the ball that was picked up.
 short getYVelocity()
          Gets the Y velocity of the ball that was picked up.
